mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM sso_role
1=1
AND ROLE_NAME LIKE '%${roleName}%'
AND IS_VALID = #{isValid}
AND ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}
AND oid NOT IN(SELECT role_oid FROM sso_role_user WHERE user_name = #{userName})

SELECT sr.oid AS oid, sr.org_code AS orgCode, so.name AS orgName, sr.role_name AS roleName, sr.role_type AS roleType, sr.description AS description, sr.order_index AS orderIndex, sr.is_valid AS isValid, sr.op_user AS opUser, sr.op_time AS opTime FROM sso_role sr LEFT JOIN sso_organization so on sr.org_code = so.code
sr.oid = '${oid}'
